Guess January layoff season has already started.
Meta essentially exiting VR to pursue AI wearables.
Rumours of significant layoffs coming (again) at MSFT, as they continue to narrowly focus on AI.

When that AI bubble bursts... it's going to be catastrophic. Some of these companies won't recover.

@xgranade although to argue against my own point, PSF has taken money from MSFT in the past, and MSFT has pretty actively served the interests of defense, ICE, etc. and one can make the point that this is not dissimilar from what a defense company does.

I don't have any particularly sharp razor [â€¦]
Apple has seen MSFT and others try; but they are looking past GSEs and search results (where google has a monopoly) and toward LLMs and agents that know you and give you the answers you need.
